trends: There has been one other sighting in Lebanon
There were no other sightings in Lebanon on or around July 17th 2006
divs: sighting detailsat approx. 11:00 pm i was sitting on my patio enjoying the night......i happened to look over my right shoulder and saw what i first thought was a very bright star......as i watched it i realized it was moving.........it was traveling in a n\w to s\e direction and was moving fairly slow......as it came closer i realized that it was in the shape of a triangle......it had 3 very very bright lights on the underside that looked like ceiling "can" lights shining down.......also there were a few other lights on the underside.......the object had sides on it.......i could make out the side and rear of it.......i could see the shape of the object with the naked eye........it didn't emit any sound and just drifted slowly in a south east direction......i watched it until it was out of site.....the sky was very clear with the stars being out.....it appeared to me that there was a slightly visible "cloud like" "vapor" around it......as i live approx 5 miles from scott air force base i called for the control tower but was told it was closed.....i then called where i work (st. clair county) and asked our dispatcher if anyone else had called about it and was told no......i've been a police officer for many years and have never seen anything like this before......
Summary: Sighting of flying triangle at night.
